result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Tyrel Jason Boyd

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Plea and Sentencing Hearing dated August 6, 2015
DEF PRESENT W/ATTY NIEMEIER - CASE DISMISSED & READ IN

No consumption or possession of alcohol.  No entering taverns, bars or liquor stores for any purpose.
May not possess or consume any controlled substances without a valid prescription in own name and take as prescribed by a licensed provider.
May not possess drug paraphernalia.
May not be present where controlled substances are illegally sold or consumed.
May not have contact with known drug dealers or drug users, or their residences.
DEFENDANT MUST COMPLY WITH THE BOND MONITORING PROGRAM.  UPON SIGNING OF THE BOND, DEFENDANT MUST APPEAR AT THE JUSTICE PROGRAM OFFICE TO SIGN UP DURING THE HOURS OF 8:00 A.M. - 4:30 P.M.  THE JUSTICE PROGRAM OFFICE IS LOCATED AT 919 HOESCHLER DRIVE, SUITE 100, SPARTA, WI.
Curfew 7pm-7am, except for work purposes or treatment purposes, as approved by the Bond Monitoring Program.
Comply with a Soberlink Unit through the Bond Monitoring Program.
DEF PRESENT WITH ATTY NIEMEIER, ATTY ASKS FOR ADJOURNMENT, CT GRANTS, PLEA HEARING ADJOURNED TO 8/6/15 AT 9:30
DEFENDANT PRESENT W/ATTY NIEMEIER - INFO FILED - DEFENDANT WAIVES READING - COURT GIVES CHARGES AND PENALTIES - DEFENDANT PLEA NOT GUILTY - HEARING 7/23/15 AT 2:00 PM.
DEFENDANT PRESENT W/ATTY NIEMEIER - COURT GIVES RIGHTS TO PRELIMINARY HEARING - DEFENDANT WAIVES RIGHT TO PRELIM - COURT FINDS PROBABLE CAUSE AND BINDS DEFENDANT OVER FOR TRIAL.
Letter received from Attorney Niemeier to Judge Goodman dated June 15, 2015.
Letter received from Attorney Niemeier to Clerk of Court dated April 24, 2015.
for Pretrial Conference and Status (Felony--Time Limits Waived)

Defendant appears in person with Attorney Niemeier.  Defendant waives reading.  Court advises of charges and penalties.  Defendant waives time limits to preliminary hearing.  Court orders $1,500 Signature Bond with conditions.
Pretrial Offer- May 11, 2015
Pretrial Conference- June 1, 2015 @ 1:30 p.m.
Status Conference- June 15, 2015 @ 3:00 p.m.
